alert.note: Alert for Burt; Cuming; Stanton; Thurston; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 6:31AM CDT until August 02 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Burt County in east central Nebraska... Cuming County in northeastern Nebraska... Southeastern Wayne County in northeastern Nebraska... Southern Thurston County in northeastern Nebraska... Northeastern Stanton County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 630 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Beemer, or 8 miles west of West Point, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... West Point, Stanton, Wisner, Pender, Lyons, Beemer, Bancroft, Pilger, Rosalie, Thurston, The Highway 9 And 51 Junction, Omaha Reservation, Aloys, and Winnebago Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
